original_text: Nor was it to offer himself repeatedly, as the high priest enters the holy places every year with blood not his own,
korean_text: 대제사장이 해마다 다른 것의 피로써 성소에 들어가는 것 같이 자주 자기를 드리려고 아니하실지니

sentences.original_text: Nor was it to offer himself repeatedly,
as the high priest enters the holy places every year
